acceptance.title: 1. Terms Acceptance
acceptance.content: By accessing and using WebFinanceLab, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access the service.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.content: WebFinanceLab is a financial management platform that allows users to manage their personal and business finances, including expense tracking, income management, and financial reporting.

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
accounts.content: To use our services, you must register and create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password, and you accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.

privacy.title: 4. Privacy and Data Protection
privacy.content: The processing of your personal data is carried out in accordance with our Privacy Policy and in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable laws.

compliance.title: 7. International Compliance
compliance.content: WebFinanceLab complies with international data protection and privacy regulations, including:
items: GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) for the European Union
Council of Europe Convention 108 for non-EU countries

dataTransfer.content: WebFinanceLab ensures that all international data transfers comply with applicable regulations:
items: Standard Contractual Clauses (SCC) for transfers outside the EU

info.title: 1. Legal Information
info.content: WebFinanceLab is a registered financial management platform operating under the data protection regulations of:
items: United States (CCPA, COPPA and applicable state laws)
Mexico (Federal Law on Protection of Personal Data)
info.note: Note: The platform complies with all applicable data protection regulations, ensuring the security and privacy of all users' data, regardless of their geographical location.

dataProtection.title: 3. Data Protection
dataProtection.content: In accordance with GDPR and LOPDGDD, we inform you that:
items: Purpose: User management and financial services provision
Legitimacy: User consent and legal obligations compliance
Recipients: Data will not be transferred to third parties except by legal obligation
Rights: Access, rectification, erasure, restriction, opposition, and portability
